  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/627</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Jo no vaig a l'escola</string>
            <string language="en">I don't go to school</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich gehe nicht zur Schule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Je ne vais pas à l'école</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu não vou à escola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Non vado alla scuola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεν πηγαίνω στο σχολείο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) sobre les conseqüències socials de la Revolució Industrial i en concret sobre l'explotació infantil als inicis de la industrialització i en l'actualitat. Conté un enllaç que permet ampliar la informació sobre l'explotació infantil.</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) on the consequences of the Industrial Revolution, and especially on child exploitation at the beginning of industrialisation as well as nowadays. It includes a link for further information on child exploitation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">nen treballador</string>
            <string language="en">child workers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">canvi social</string>
            <string language="en">social change</string>
            <string language="es">cambio social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">canvi tecnològic</string>
            <string language="en">technological change</string>
            <string language="es">cambio tecnológico</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf den 
Konsequenzen der industriellen Revolution und besonders auf 
Kindausnutzung am Anfang der Industrialisierung sowie heutzutage. 
Sie schließt ein Link für weitere Informationen über 
Kindausnutzung ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) sur les 
conséquences de la révolution industrielle, et particulièrement sur
l'exploitation d'enfant au début de l'industrialisation aussi bien 
que de nos jours. Elle inclut un lien pour de plus amples 
informations sur l'exploitation d'enfant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) nas conseqüências
da volta industrial, e especial na exploração da criança no começo
do industrialisation as.well.as hoje em dia. Inclui uma 
ligação para uma informação mais adicional na exploração da 
criança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) sulle 
conseguenze della rivoluzione industriale e particolarmente su 
sfruttamento del bambino all'inizio dell'industrializzazione così 
come al giorno d'oggi. Include un collegamento per ulteriori 
informazioni su sfruttamento del bambino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στις συνέπειες της 
βιομηχανικής επανάστασης, και ειδικά στην εκμετάλλευση παιδιών 
στην αρχή της εκβιομηχάνισης καθώς επίσης και σήμερα. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες πληροφορίες στην 
εκμετάλλευση παιδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kindarbeiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialänderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">technologische Änderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ouvriers d'enfant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">changement technologique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalhadores da criança</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança social</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mudança technological</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">operai del bambino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento sociale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento tecnologico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εργαζόμενοι παιδιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνική αλλαγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεχνολογική αλλαγή</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
